title: Naked Party - 2000 - Chinese 'Documentary' about the AV sc
description:
no IMdB listing

This story, which I am uploading in tandem with "Scout Man" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4892763 , follows three Chinese sex industry journalists who are assigned to cover the Japanese Adult Video industry in Kabukicho (a section of Tokyo).

This is a much more informative, if somewhat faked (some parts are clearly not taking place in Japan) look at the AV industry in Japan, than "Scout Man" though the two cover very similar ground.

Everything is in Chinese, and I don't think there are versions with Japanese, since the story wouldn't work right.

There are some very candid interviews with some of the bigger names in AV Japan, and there is some Cat III-worthy content, but this too, should not be seen as porno, or you will be sadly disappointed.

This one is a bit more light-hearted than "Scout Man", but you may be a bit taken aback by what the Japanese are willing to pay for.

Chinese NTSC VIDEO_TS folders
